alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 4:58PM MDT until July 11 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Meade County in west central South Dakota... East central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 458 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of New Underwood, or 14 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... New Underwood around 510 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Owanka, Wicksville and Wasta. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 69 and 98. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
